title: Create in-memory data store
description:
Implement an in-memory data store for todos.

Requirements:
- Create a data store module
- Use JavaScript array to store todos
- Implement functions for CRUD operations:
  - getAllTodos()
  - getTodoById(id)
  - createTodo(data)
  - updateTodo(id, data)
  - deleteTodo(id)
- Generate unique IDs for new todos
- Handle timestamps (createdAt, updatedAt)

Acceptance Criteria:
- Data store module exports all CRUD functions
- Functions handle edge cases (not found, invalid data)
- IDs are unique
- Timestamps are automatically managed
